attributes.action: Address the climate change due to petroleum fuelled vehicles by abolishing the Road fund Duty and Third Party Insurance requirements and adding the appropriate duty to the price of the hydrocarbon fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will both encourage drivers to consider each journey and the vehicle to be used. The non payment of the RFD and Insurance would be dealt with and reduced mileage/vehicle efficiency rewarded.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
